title: on me by section 18(2) of the Defence (Amendment) Act 2021 (No. 33 of 2021),
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Defence (Amendment) Act 2021
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Defence (Amendment) Act 2021 

(Commencement) Order 2022.
text_norm: 1 order may cited defence (amendment) act 2021 (commencement) order 2022

title: on me by section 18(2) of the Defence (Amendment) Act 2021 (No. 33 of 2021),
heading: 2. The 4th day of April 2022 is appointed as the day on which the Defence
text_raw:
2. The 4th day of April 2022 is appointed as the day on which the Defence 

(Amendment) Act 2021 (No. 33 of 2021) shall come into operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

30 March, 2022. 

SIMON COVENEY, 

Minister for Defence. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 19th April, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [179] 3 

BAILE ÁTHA CLIATH 
ARNA FHOILSIÚ AG OIFIG AN tSOLÁTHAIR
